DOC.brief_summary: Investigators design novel combining technique rescuer start chest compression one hand call help Emergency Medical System ( EMS ) via cell phone another hand witness arrest victim . This method may helpful reduce hand-off time increase faction time chest compression arrival EMS member . To verify hypothesis , conduct random , control simulation study .
DOC.brief_title: Combining Performance Call EMS Simultaneous Chest Compressions Lone Rescuer CPR
DOC.detailed_description: This study use random , control design simulation set use manikin . Study participant recruit healthy adult ( age > 18 year ) layperson attend BLS training course provide BLS train class . The simulation scenario consist witness hospital cardiac arrest activation EMS system prepare cellular phone . Interventional method contain immediate start chest compression one hand call help EMS via cell phone another hand . We compare quality CPR novel interventional method ( start CPR Call EMS ) conventional method ( First Call EMS start CPR ) .
DOC.criteria: All healthy volunteer attend basic CPR training class Agreement simulation trial volunteer healthy problem may affect study result Not agreement simulation trial
